title: EBRD Shareholders and Board of Governors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors. These members can not be on the Board of Governors. Its function is to direct the general operations ...

title: Board of Governors Information
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects · Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development Shareholders and Board of Governors
snippet: Full list of the shareholders and board of governors of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) which is owned by 65 countries and two European insitutions.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Victoria Márquez-Mees is the first Chief Accountability Officer of the EBRD’s Independent Project Accountability Mechanism. The role reports to the Board of Directors.
